thread.title: BRIEF-Catabasis Pharma Aligns Resources To Focus On Lead Program Edasalonexent

title: BRIEF-Catabasis Pharma Aligns Resources To Focus On Lead Program Edasalonexent
text:
April 17, 2018 / 8:09 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Catabasis Pharma Aligns Resources To Focus On Lead Program Edasalonexent Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 17 (Reuters) - Catabasis Pharmaceuticals Inc: 
* CATABASIS PHARMACEUTICALS ALIGNS RESOURCES TO FOCUS ON LEAD PROGRAM EDASALONEXENT FOR THE TREATMENT OF DUCHENNE MUSCULAR DYSTROPHY 
* CATABASIS PHARMACEUTICALS INC - STRATEGIC CORPORATE RESTRUCTURING SUPPORTS GOAL OF ADVANCING EDASALONEXENT TOWARDS POTENTIAL REGISTRATION 
* CATABASIS PHARMACEUTICALS INC - RESTRUCTURING WILL REDUCE COMPANYâ€™S WORKFORCE BY APPROXIMATELY 42% 
* CATABASIS PHARMACEUTICALS INC - ESTIMATES ANNUALIZED SAVINGS OF APPROXIMATELY $3.3 MILLION IN PERSONNEL-RELATED COSTS 
* CATABASIS PHARMACEUTICALS INC - ESTIMATED ONE-TIME SEVERANCE AND RELATED COSTS OF APPROXIMATELY $1.0 MILLION IN Q2 OF 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
